AMRN Let me tell you how its going to go down You can thank CaptBeer and the mail order lawyer for this one The FDA will simply state that REDUCEIT failed to prove a reduction in CV events due to an active placebo that impaired statin performance To what degree we dont know Nor do we care well they may omit that Were sorry We accept our responsibility for approving mineral oil in the first place but each successive Vascepa study added to our knowledge base and awareness of this unmistakable fact Consequently all Vascepa studies to date are flawed Now because were an agency that puts the public safety first were going to graciously maintain Vascepas existing approval as a therapy for very high triglycerides Additionally we will affirm Amarins right to truthfully communicate to doctors and patients its proven benefits However a new large Phase3 study with an inert starchbased placebo like corn oil must be conducted before we can grant a label change
